: what basically apt-cacher-ng.  do? could you please elaborate it. i am googling too.

one machine serves as the 'cache' all box's get their updates/packages from it first.. and if it dosent have it.. it gets it and adds it to the cache so the rest of the lan dont have to get it from the internet.
